skills.name: User Experience (UX) Design
skills.description: Designing user-friendly interfaces to enhance usability and satisfaction.

skills.name: Usability Testing
skills.description: Conducting research to evaluate a product's user-friendliness and find improvements.

skills.name: Interaction Design
skills.description: Creating intuitive ways for users to interact with products or systems.

skills.name: Human-Centered AI
skills.description: Building AI systems that align with human values and needs.

skills.name: Augmented Reality (AR) Interfaces
skills.description: Designing interfaces that integrate virtual elements into the real world.

skills.name: Cognitive Psychology
skills.description: Understanding mental processes to inform design decisions.

skills.name: Accessibility Design
skills.description: Making sure products are usable by people of all abilities and disabilities.

skills.name: Data Visualization
skills.description: Presenting data clearly and effectively through visual storytelling.
